summary: Yiddish/Hebrew keyboard map, Israeli layout + finials on shift, Unicode
name: yiheb-il.vim
description: Yiddish/Hebrew keyboard map, finial letters on shifted keys, releasing punctu keys + 'oilwq', maps yiddish + nikud. Unicode.
install_details:
put in ~/.vim/keymap/
 :set keymap=yi
optionally:
 :set rl
and select a proper font, for either gvim or termimal
for example:
 :set guifont=-misc-fixed-medium-r-normal-*-*-140-*-*-c-*-iso10646-1
optionally:
:set revins
help hebrew
for more info
